attributes.action: i want the pm to grant the right to live before the general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: dear pm, did you ever know that about 99% of the black community do not want the labour lose the coming general election?but the sad thing is that about 70% of us don't have the right to live and therefore can not vote.could you please do something about it before the sad thing happen to us.
